Module roborally.roborally
Package bb.roborally.server.game.activation

Class MovementCheck

java.lang.Object
bb.roborally.server.game.activation.MovementCheck
public class MovementCheck extends Object
Class contains all exported methods of the needed checks for managing the Movement of the Robots

  • Method Details

    • checkIfBlockedAlt

      public boolean checkIfBlockedAlt(Position position, Orientation orientation, int step) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      checks if a robot is blocked by a wall
      Parameters:
      position - --> position of the Robot which is the reference Point for the check
      orientation - --> Orintation of the referenced Robot
      step - --> indicating the steps of checking, makes the method variable for each situation
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • checkIfLastTwoAreNeighbors

      public boolean checkIfLastTwoAreNeighbors(User user1, User user2, Orientation orientation, int step) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      user1 - --> first Robot
      user2 - --> second Robot
      orientation - --> orientation of Robot that is the reference Point (Robot that is actively moving
      step - --> variable for making method reusable
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException
